messages.forgot-password: Enter the email address you used to register. You will receive a link to reset your password.

errorMessages.network: A network error has occurred. Please try again or contact your administrator.

validation.zipCode: Zip code must be in a format "44-200"

create.error: An error occurred while creating the object.

edit.error: An error occurred while editing the object.

delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the object.

update.error: An error occurred while updating the object.

order.success: The order was successfully submitted and forwarded to the administration.
order.error: An error occurred while placing the order.

signup.success: Registration was successful. Logging in will be possible after the account is activated by the administrator.
signup.error: User with given login or email address already exists.

forgot-password.success: You will receive a link to reset your password to the email address provided.
forgot-password.error: There is no account registered for this email address.

reset-password.success: Password has been changed successfully, you can login now.
reset-password.error: An error occurred while changing the password.
